channel.title: Bhaskar Vamsi's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Bhaskar Vamsi's Personal Blog

item.title: GhostintheAttic_short
item.description: Vamsi was a 12-year-old boy who lived with his father. He was very healthy, a bit too healthy, one can say. He was round like a tomato, and that’s what his classmates used to call him. He wasn’t very popular and didn’t have any friends. They had recently moved to a new city where his father got a new job and had bought a new house on the outskirts of the town because it was a bit close to his work and Vamsi’s new School.

item.title: Mysecond_post
Mypost
item.description: This is my first post Lets create a static site with HuGo! { "This": { "is":"JSON" } }

About me I am Technical Writer by passion and profession, and I love technology. I convert technical jargon into easy-to-understand, everyday language! I started this blog/website hoping to write articles that I think are worth sharing with the world. Here you can find articles ranging from cooking recipes to how the software works. Thanks for visiting!
You can reach me at 404, html street, attributelane Elemental city HTML Mobile:822138912 (not a real number) email me Back

My Hobbies Writing stories Reading Books Cooking Learning to code Playing Video Games YouTube Playlist Link 1 YouTube Playlist Link 2 YouTube LiveStream 1 YouTube LiveStream 2 YouTube LiveStream 3 Back
My Recognition at TechMahindra Awarded for my contributions as a lead of 3 people and delivering project with ~97% accuracy. Back

Bhaskar Vamsi Dontaraju’s current Resume Bhaskar Vamsi Dontaraju Technical Writer Loyalty, Commitment, and Discipline are integral to my character. I am a highly motivated information developer with good expertise and hands-on experience across structured authoring tools, API reference writing, UX writing, style guides, and Document Development Processes.
